title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion Swiss francs, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion Swiss francs has decreased over the Year.

Revenue in billion Swiss francs is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Revenue in billion Swiss francs about 14.0 was recorded at Year 2008
Min Revenue in billion Swiss francs about 7.9 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion Swiss francs, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2018.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2011.
